content.rendered:
Why We Love Same Day Flower Delivery

Is there anything better than same day flower delivery? There’s not much you can get delivered on the same day, but our divine floral arrangements are one of them! We’ve put together this blog to share with you why same day flower delivery is so important to us and all the ways you can utilise it to your advantage! We’ll also tell you a little bit about the specialty floral couriers who make sure your florals arrive to you with the same attention to detail that we put in when we create them.

Flexibility & Freshness

LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio is proud to offer same day flower delivery for fresh florals ordered before 11am. This gives flexibility to choose the exact day that you want your flowers delivered, ensuring that the flowers you receive are fresh and of the highest quality. If you’re having trouble choosing from the range, our Designer Posies are always a favourite. This shorter style posy is a classic choice full of seasonal, perfumed, textured florals and foliages, presented either in our signature wrap and ribbon or in a minimal glass vase to suit their style.

We hand-pick our florals and foliages from local flower markets on the day, choosing to support other local businesses as much as we possibly can. There’s certainly an art in choosing the best of each variety to ensure a luxe look and feel that will last as long as possible. LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio is known for our on-trend floral designs, inspired by the latest European looks, paying tribute to Melbourne and Sydney floristry.

Perfect for Last Minute Gifts

For the last minute gift giver, same day flower delivery has your back! Modern life is crazy, we totally understand, and you’re probably juggling a million things at once. So, sometimes when you see in your calendar that it’s a special someone’s birthday or an anniversary, your options feel limited by the time you have to select the perfect gift and actually go and purchase it.

Trust us, when you see our beautiful range of florals available with luxurious packaging and elegant add-ons, you’ll feel spoiled for choice! Whether it’s an impactful En Masse arrangement with their favourite flowers or a stunning Designer Floral Bowl arrangement, you can rest assured that the recipient will be thrilled with their gift and same day flower delivery can make it happen today. All you need to do is check out online before 11am and provide their delivery details and you’ve checked another thing off your list!

Surprise Someone You Love

Do you live far away but have someone you love living on the Gold Coast? Skip the long wait times on sending other gifts and surprise them with the gift of luxury – LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio arrangements and gift hampers are all available with same day flower delivery. With same day delivery, it doesn’t matter how far away you are – you can gift stunning bouquet of flowers with just a few clicks.

LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio offer a range of beautiful options for your surprise gift. For bigger occasions, you can’t go past our Gift Hampers – think delicate posies, sparkling wine, decadent Byron Bay Loco Love chocolates and locally made Romy Louise Candles for the ultimate touch of luxury! For a just-because gift, we love Locally Grown Dahlias in our En Masse style paired with our signature wrap and ribbon for an elegant way to say ‘thinking of you’.

Celebrate Exciting News

One of the best surprises in the world is finding out some exciting news from a friend or family member. Whether they’ve announced an engagement, pregnancy, birth or other life milestone, sending florals from LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio means that you can show your love and support as soon as you find out with same day flower delivery. We have a range of florals and foliages available to suit every occasion and our signature style means that your gift will have a touch of luxe that shows how happy you are for them. Our Designer Bouquets are fantastic celebration gifts, presented in our signature wrap and ribbon or a contemporary glass vase – choose from petite, standard, generous, lush or luxe options. Our creative florists love to design these bouquets, and can create something perfect for every occasion.

Be There in Difficult Times

On the flip-side, showing support for our loved ones in difficult times can feel like a minefield. You want to respect their privacy, but also be there for them in any way they need. Sending a floral arrangement can be the perfect way to show you care, and same day flower delivery means there’s no delay in letting them know you’re there for them. Hand-delivered by our specialty floral couriers, they’ll receive the flowers you choose with a personal touch without the overwhelm of visitors. Our Designer Vase Arrangements or Phalaenopsis Orchids are a good choice for sympathy flowers as they are ready to be placed straight in the recipients home, meaning they don’t need to look for a vase that fits the arrangement – especially if they are receiving other deliveries at this time.

Have a Self-Care Moment

We are huge advocates for self-care, and what says ‘I love you’ better than sending yourself flowers? Order before 11am and receive your florals with same day delivery, so by tonight you can be enjoying them with a glass of bubbly in the bath. One of our personal favourite products for a gift to yourself are the Fresh Florals for Home – they’re minimalist, affordable and let you express your creativity with fresh market flowers. Add on a Myles Gray crystal candle for an extra touch of relaxation with style.

Send Your Apologies in Style

Forced to miss a special event you were looking forward to? Whether it be due to waking up unwell, problems finding child care or any one of those curve balls life likes to throw at us, you can send your apologies in beautiful fashion with same day delivery from LULLY & ROSE. While they’ll miss you, the recipients will know how much you care and appreciate the extra effort you’ve put in to make their day special. For milestone birthdays, we love a Gift Hamper or one of our Designer Posies. For housewarmings or weddings, a Phalaenopsis Orchid is the perfect piece for the couple’s home and if you’re missing your partner because you’re away for an anniversary, our Signature Floral Hearts really are the next best thing.

Why We Use Avidity Deliveries

At LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio, we infuse love into crafting your flowers and ensure they’re delivered with utmost care. Every LULLY & ROSE creation is hydrated, meticulously hand-delivered on the same day by our dedicated flower courier, Avidity Deliveries.

Avidity Deliveries is a key LULLY & ROSE partner, offering same day flower delivery throughout the Gold Coast, Hinterland & Northern NSW. Being a specialised flower courier, we know our florals are in the best capable hands. Avidity Deliveries ensure your flowers arrive at your door with the same love and care with which they were made. Established in 2020 by Luke and Margie, Avidity Deliveries transports our fresh florals since inception. Commencing LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio concurrently solidified our partnership. Their unparalleled service and professionalism, transporting and delivering our exquisite florals, deeply resonate.

About LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio

LULLY & ROSE Floral Studio is a luxury florist centrally located in Queensland’s beautiful Gold Coast. Proudly founded, owned and operated by Rachael, LULLY & ROSE is a haven of perfumed, seasonal, textured florals and foliages.

Drawing inspiration from the latest contemporary trends in Europe and Australia’s capital cities creating luxurious designs. Rachael crafts opulent designs. Infusing the distinctive spirit of the Gold Coast and her artistic touch into every creation. Each arrangement becomes a unique arrangement ensuring no two pieces ever look exactly the same.

The underlying vision is simple yet profound – to unveil the innate beauty of flowers, igniting inspiration through modern, unpretentious floral arrangements, all while prioritising support for local Australian farmers and growers.

The foundation of LULLY & ROSE finds its roots in cherished memories shared with Rachael’s grandmother who gifted Rachael with a love for flowers. The name itself, LULLY & ROSE, pays homage to these influential figures – Rachael’s own grandmother, fondly called Lully nurtured her passion amidst gardens adorned with roses, hydrangeas, sweet peas, freesias, and lavender. This very connection sparked the inception of LULLY & ROSE.

Rachael has over 10 years of experience in the florist industry as qualified floral designer so when you order from her, you know you’re getting the best quality and service from someone who is truly passionate about florals.

We welcome you to shop with LULLY & ROSE today for a touch of luxury on every occasion.

Fresh Flower
